definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be all skin and bones (idiom)/also written 皮包骨[pi2 bao1 gu3]
to look for bones in an egg/to find fault/to nitpick (idiom)
pinyin: ji1 dan4 li5 tiao1 gu3 tou5

definition: weary old body (colloquial term, used jocularly or irreverently)

pinyin: chi1 ren2 bu4 tu3 gu3 tou2

sentences.english: Too much bone in their skulls.
sentences.chinese: 马的头盖上，骨头太多了。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在吃鱼的时候，才可以用手去捏鱼骨头。

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨介入治疗儿童股骨头缺血性坏死的价值。

sentences.english: Later, at home, Zilla would accuse him of being a coward and a weakling .
sentences.chinese: 等到了家里，齐拉就数落他是个懦夫，软骨头。

sentences.english: She then took the chicken bones home and made soup out of them.
sentences.chinese: 然后她把鸡骨头打包回家，做成了汤。

sentences.english: Vujacic said he wasn't sure when he suffered the avulsion fracture.
sentences.chinese: 武贾西奇说，他并不知道什么时候骨头撕脱了。

sentences.english: Bones hung from the ceiling like a macabre chandelier.
sentences.chinese: 吊在天花板上的骨头就像是一个阴森的枝形吊灯。

sentences.english: Myositis ossificans is a benign condition of heterotopic bone formation.
sentences.chinese: 骨化性肌炎是骨头异位性形成的一个良性情况。

sentences.english: I'm afraid my sister married a real wimp.
sentences.chinese: 我看我的妹妹大概是嫁了一个真正的软骨头。

sentences.english: Well, the X-ray shows your bone hasn's been injured.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，x光射线显示你的骨头未受损伤。

sentences.english: This is when a bone is bent and breaks along only 1 side, like a young stick of wood.
sentences.chinese: 当骨头弯曲，且就一侧边折断，如同一根青嫩的枝条。

sentences.english: Happiness us that Cat eats fishes, Dog enjoys bones and Heroes beat the veils.
sentences.chinese: 幸福就是猫吃鱼，狗啃骨头，奥特曼打小怪兽。

sentences.english: Blood supply reestablishment of avascular necrosis of femoral head with digital subtraction angiography.
sentences.chinese: 股骨头坏死血供重建的数字减影血管造影研究。

sentences.english: They are boiling down the bones.
He looked just like an old dog  gnawing on a bone.
sentences.chinese: 他看来活像啃骨头的老狗。

definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
